name: Code To Post
author: Ryuta Sakai

sections.description:
⚠️ This plugin in development

This plugin update or make post from static html files.
It’s useful for development.

How it works:

  1. Create a base directory on your server.
  2. Create directory named by “post type slug” in base directory.
  3. Put html file in the directory. and save post content to this html.
  4. Go to ‘Code to Post’ menu, and click ‘Update to Post’.

Example tree

my-posts-dir
├── post ( posttype slug )
│ ├── hello.html ( post slug.html )
│ └── any-slug.html
│
├── page
│ ├── about.html
│ ├── searvice.html
│ └── searvice ( parent post slug )
│ ├── searvice-child-01.html
│ └── searvice-child-02.html
│
└── my-custom-post
├── custom-post-01.html
└── custom-post-02.html
sections.installation:
1. Upload code-to-post to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Update congiguration through ‘Code to Post’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:

  • In development
  • Bugfix: When saving unpublished, it will be newly saved.
  • Update: Added ja language file.

0.1.1-BETA

  • update readme

0.1.0-BETA

  • In development

short_description: Import static Html to post content.
